item.title: Finding Refuge from the Storms of Life
item.description:
Finding Refuge from the Storms of Life by Elder Ricardo P. Giménez, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 190th Annual General Conference on Tue Mar 31 2020
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Ricardo P. Giménez, Of the Seventy

item.title: My Love for the Savior Is My “Why”
item.description:
My Love for the Savior Is My “Why” by Elder Ricardo P. Giménez, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 195th Annual General Conference on Mon Mar 31 2025
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
